name: Linex Downloader
author: Alireza Tajary

sections.description: Sometimes you see a file in web that you like. You download it and upload it to your site. This plugin helps you to directley upload the file to your site. It gets the URL of file, a file name and a title, then it downloads the file to your server. You can see list of downloaded files to put them in your posts.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the plugin
  2. Go to linex downloader menu in admin

short_description: A WordPress plugin that downloads files from web and puts them in the uploads folder.
description: Sometimes you see a file in web that you like. You download it and upload it to your site. This plugin helps you to directley upload the file to your site.
